= Components =

|| *Component ID* || *Component Name* || *Type* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HM_SOL HMA.HM.SOL] || Solitary Nucleus || nucleus || Carry taste buds, thoracic and abdominal viscera || c.n. VII, IX, X ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_PE5 HMA.HM.TGM.PE5] || Peritrigeminal Nucleus || nucleus || Thermoregulation || Project to thermosensitive neurons of medial<BR>preoptic area ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_STR HMA.HM.TGM.STR] || Spinal Trigeminal Nucleus || nucleus || Discriminative sensation and light touch of face, conscious proprioception || Pontine Nuclei, part of cranial nerve nuclei, ear ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PN_SC HMA.HP.PN.SC] || Nucleus Subceruleus || nucleus || Tongue control || To hypoglossal nucleus ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PRF_CRF HMA.HP.PRF.CRF] || Caudal Pontine Reticular Nucleus || nucleus || Mediate head movements || Grinding of the teeth in sleep, projections from<BR>superior colliculus, to spinal cord, extends to<BR>facial ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PRF_GCR HMA.HP.PRF.GCR] || Gigantocellular Reticular Nucleus || nucleus || Mediate head movements || Projects to hypoglossal nucleus, abducens ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PRF_PDT HMA.HP.PRF.PDT] || Pontine Reticulotegmental Nucleus || nucleus || Mediate saccadic eye movements || Inactivation leads to deficit of expression, but<BR>not learning ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PRF_RPO HMA.HP.PRF.RPO] || Oral Pontine Reticular Nucleus || nucleus || Mediation of changing to and from REM sleep || Part of horizontal gaze center, projects to spinal<BR>cord and abducens ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_PTR HMA.HP.PTP.PTR] || Principal Trigeminal Nucleus || nucleus || Facial Somatic Sensations || Upper, maxillary, ophthalmic ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] || Trigeminal Motor Nucleus || nucleus || Muscles of first branchial arch || Pontine Nuclei, lower face and jaw control, Motor<BR>Nucleus of V n. ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_MM_CJ HMA.MM.CJ] || Cajal Nucleus || nucleus || Integration of head and eye movements, controls downward vertical gaze || Projects to CN3, CN4 nuclei, rotation of body about<BR>its long axis, Project to vestibular nuclei ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_MM_RIMLF HMA.MM.RIMLF] || Rostral Interstitial Nucleus of MLF || nucleus || Integration of head and eye movements, controls upward vertical gaze ||  ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_SC_VH_SAN HMA.SC.VH.SAN] || Spinal Accessory Nucleus || nucleus || Control of neck || Rotate head, continuus from AMB ||
